name: Roi Calculator
author: mgplugin

sections.description:
For using This plugin you Can Know ratio that compares the gain or loss from an investment relative to its cost.

you can know the result of profit or lose derived from any investment and get price of investment gain.

Also know calculate annualized rate of return which is equivalent annual return an investor receives over a given period.

To run this plugin you need to put shortcode in your page:
([roi_calc])

Features:

  • Easy To Use
  • Mobile Friendly Ui
  • Customize Header Title Text And Font Size
  • Also Customize Header Border Color
  • Customize body Title color, Border Color, Background Color
  • Customize Input Field Background Hover Color
  • Select chart type
  • Change chart invested and profit amount color
  • Customize calculation result setting
  • Customize calculation heading text setting
  • Customize calculation results title text setting
  • Set min and max investment amount with default investment
  • Set min and max return amount with default return
  • Set min and max investment period with default year
  • Display result with chart
  • Display result with table
sections.installation:
1. Download the file to install and activate.
  2. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
